Summary: I visited Orange Couny, California at the end of September 2022, and stayed at the Castaway Hotel in Orange, California.  The location was great.  There were many restaurants and stores witin walking distance.  It was only about ten minutes away from Disneyland, and had easy access to major highways, such as the 5.  But the service was horrible.  There was literally no housekeeping at all at the hotel.  They provided me with two towels and washcloths for the whole week and never replaced them.  I only had two rolls of toilet paper, and had to ask the front desk for another one.  I ended up buying my own toilet paper.  Plus there was a huge dent in the shower, and the lights in the hotel kept flickering on and off.  I would not stay there again.  I know that we may be in a

From an unfriendly check in experience through a 1/4" gap in the window to the person passed out on the stairs, definitely not something that I care to repeat. Room dirty, heater didn't work, etc. Glad that I survived my stay!

I would give negative stars if I could. Our room was dirty. There was old pizza on a cardboard "plate" in the microwave; Bacon on the carpet (I'm guessing a former pizza topping); White pieces of "popcorn"on the carpet; An earring laying on the floor beside a chair; The rubber cover from an earbud; Hair on the pillow; and many, many mysterious carpet spots. Also, the window in the bathroom had no way to lock or secure it closed. We went and bought cleaning supplies and were going to tough it out. But when we returned, our key wouldn't work. Some how our key that was supposed to be for our room 105A opened 105. Unbeknownst to us, we went in and left our things in the wrong room. The manager/owner wouldn't allow us to use 105A (which was cleaner) because we had went into 105. And

Arrived at 12:30 pm to a locked lobby, rang the bell and waited 5 min. for someone to answer. Checked in and was given a TV remote which did not work, went back down to the lobby and rang two different bells for at least 10 minutes before he answered. The worst part was the room. I had to leave on business and returned later that evening and surveyed the room and found the curtains were broken, the toilet seat was broken, the toilet paper holder was missing, found hair of all sorts including pubic hair in the shower, wash basin and on the pillow cases in the bed. All in all this was the filthiest place I have ever stayed. I did report this to the manager when I checked out and he turned his back on me when I finished telling him about the above issues. I hope this gets posted as
Room tip: Do not stay at this hotel!!!!!

Summary Heading: very nice service and reasonable prices
Summary: the rooms are big and come with fridge and microwave . gives free wifi, and bedding is comfortable to sleep in wayyyy better the golden west motel. That place is disgusting don't ever go there, Go here instead to castaway.  I wish checkout wasnt so early though . Besides that I love staying here , Kudo
